channel.title: Teleing/Certain areas
channel.description:
Whenever I tele or go to certain places I get this: [code] Venticus user client - release 29317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8481) at client.method146(client.java:11579) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:7547) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8405) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4317) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
IT Freezes the client the mintue I enter the area etc.
I am using the Mopar Renamed Deob, and using a DeltaClean server that I am using to learn RSPS.

item.title: Teleing/Certain areas
item.dc:creator: @Fagex1 Fagex.
item.description:
@Fagex1 wrote:

It’s because the map/area is loading something I don’t have but the server does = crash.

I just don’t know what that is that’s causing it specifically.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleing/Certain areas
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Fagex., post:5, topic:342135”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=438545.msg3222985#msg3222985 date=1275333436]
the client ain’t compatible with deltascape.
[/quote]
What though is making that happen. Is it an NPC? An Object? There’s something remote to that area causing it. If I can remove it/fix ti/add it to my client…

Bluurs is crap.[/quote]well recontruct your own then.
add all the models, gfx, animations, objects, walls, areas, mapping and shit bluur has.
have fun working on this

Read full topic
